articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: KL Rahul relieved from keeping duties, Dravid's big statement on Bharat vs Jurel - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Rahul, who had kept quite beautifully in the two-match Test series against South Africa, would not play as a keeper in the five-match series against England. | Cricket
articles.content: It will be a toss-up between KS Bharat and Dhruv Jurel for the wicketkeeper's spot for the first Test against England at the Rajiv Gandhi Stadium in Hyderabad starting Thursday as India head coach Ra… [+2466 chars]
